sentences.en: He sold the contracts to another speculator for a profit.
sentences.cn: 为了牟利他把合约卖给了另一个投机商。

sentences.en: By his own admission, he evaded paying taxes as a Florida real-estate speculator.
sentences.cn: 据他自己承认，他作为佛罗里达房地产投机商时逃过税。

sentences.en: He was a sinister and crafty speculator.
sentences.cn: 他是一个险诈的投机商。
